about_the_game:
Pieter Both Village is a third-person adventure zombie game that takes you to a remote, eerie village at the foot of the legendary Pieter Both mountain in Mauritius. Inspired by a chilling Mauritian folktale, the game immerses you in a world where myth and reality collide, and the past refuses to stay buried.

MAIN FEATURES

Engaging Storyline: Uncover the mystery behind the curse of Pieter Both Village. Explore a dark tale where every clue brings you closer to unraveling the haunting secrets of the cursed mountain.

Zombie Survival: Face undead villagers and creatures! Use your wits and weapons to survive in a world where danger is around every corner.

Atmospheric Exploration: Navigate through a variety of eerie environments, including the desolate village, the foreboding Pieter Both mountain, an ancient temple shrouded in mystery, and expansive sugar cane fields that hide dark secrets. Each setting is meticulously designed to keep you on edge as you piece together the village’s tragic past.

Challenging Puzzles: Uncover new areas and reveal hidden secrets. Every puzzle you solve brings you closer to lifting the curse.

Mauritian Folklore: Immerse yourself in a unique setting inspired by local legends. Discover elements of Mauritian history, including the legendary dodo and treasures, woven into the narrative.

* Compelling storyline with an ever-changing environment

* Action focused adventure with guns and hand combat system

* Interaction mechanics including jump, jump over, crouch and item pickup

content_descriptors.notes: The game requires that you fight off infected enemies using body attacks or fire arms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Though not required, SSD for storage and 16 GB of memory is recommended

short_description: Third-person horror action-adventure game fighting your way through an infected Mauritian village. Play as a local protagonist battling his way to understand the cause of this infection set in a third person setting.
